Title: Prohibits certain devices which enhance a vehicle's capacity to emit soot, smoke or other particulate emissions
Summary: Prohibits certain devices which enhance a vehicle's capacity to emit soot, smoke or other particulate emissions.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting certain devices which enhance a vehicle's capacity to emit soot, smoke or other particulate emissions
